undecim:In joomla While trying to save in Global Configuration, I'm getting error saying: Could not save data. Error: *Could not write to the configuration file.*
Ah, the configuration file it's referring to is not the apache config
It's a file in the joomla directory
While trying to save in Global Configuration, I'm getting error saying: Could not save data. Error: *Could not write to the configuration file.*
You need to make configuration.php in the joomla directory writable.
That is the file Joomla is trying to write to.
Is joomla installed in your home directory in public_html, or in /var/www?
Then open a terminal and type "sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www" to make sure www-data is the owner and group of all the files in /var/www
Then you can type "sudo chmod -R u+rw /var/www to make sure that all the files there can be read/written by www-data"
Then Joomla should have no problems saving configurations
